heroIntro: Discover your golf lifestyle sanctuary at La Finca Golf in Algorfa, where this exceptional 2-bedroom bungalow offers the perfect base for serious golfers and lifestyle enthusiasts. Priced at €315,000, this property represents outstanding value—premium specification at 50% less than comparable coastal towns. This bungalow sits perfectly positioned within the resort's exclusive enclave, offering convenient access to the championship 18-hole course, clubhouse facilities, and the vibrant 19th hole social scene. Whether you're a serious golfer, weekend enthusiast, or seeking a lifestyle-focused property investment, this Algorfa gem delivers year-round sunshine, established golf infrastructure, and a genuinely international expat community. areaSection: Algorfa is a charming inland village in southern Alicante province, positioned strategically between the Costa Blanca's coastal attractions and the serene Golf Valley. Located approximately 50km south of Alicante city, this authentic Spanish village offers the perfect balance of local character and modern amenities. The surrounding landscape features rolling terrain interspersed with extensive golf courses, making it the de facto golfing capital of the Costa Blanca. Algorfa enjoys a Mediterranean climate with over 300 days of sunshine annually, ideal for year-round golf. The area has evolved from a quiet agricultural community into a thriving residential destination without losing its genuine Spanish charm. Unlike overcrowded coastal developments, Algorfa maintains a relaxed, spacious feel where English is widely spoken within the international community, yet authentic Spanish traditions remain intact. The village itself offers local supermarkets, restaurants serving both traditional Spanish cuisine and international options, and weekly markets that reflect the region's agricultural heritage.
lifestyleSection: Life in Algorfa centers on an active, outdoors-focused community where golf isn't just a hobby—it's a lifestyle. Your daily routine seamlessly integrates world-class golf facilities with laid-back Mediterranean living. Mornings begin with breakfast at the clubhouse overlooking fairways, afternoons offer rounds at championship courses like La Finca's celebrated 18-hole layout or nearby Lo Romero and Vistabella. The international golf community speaks English, eats brunch, and organizes tournaments year-round. Beyond golf, Algorfa offers easy access to beaches within 15-20 minutes, where Guardamar's coastal walks and La Mata's family-friendly shores provide afternoon retreats. The expatriate community is well-established and welcoming, with countless international restaurants, social clubs, and events. Shopping is convenient with Mercadona in nearby Rojales and larger commercial centers in Torrevieja. Healthcare standards are excellent, with English-speaking doctors available, and Torrevieja's modern hospital just 20 minutes away. This isn't retirement living—it's an active, engaged lifestyle where golf, socializing, dining, and outdoor activities intertwine naturally throughout your week.
investmentSection: This €315,000 investment delivers compelling financial fundamentals alongside lifestyle benefits. Properties in Algorfa have appreciated 12% year-on-year, significantly outpacing inflation and providing solid capital growth potential. Holiday rental data shows typical weekly rates of €900, generating approximately €46,800 annually at 60% occupancy—realistic for an on-site golf resort property with strong international demand. At €4,315 per m², this represents premium specification pricing yet remains 50% below comparable coastal properties in Benidorm, Jávea, or Moraira. The golf-centric location provides exceptional rental appeal: golfers actively seek accommodations adjacent to championship courses, and La Finca's reputation drives consistent summer bookings and winter tournament guests. Algorfa's inland position avoids coastal oversupply, maintaining stronger price stability. Combined with genuine lifestyle enjoyment, this property offers rare dual benefits—a personal golf haven that simultaneously generates rental income through professional management agencies servicing the resort.
conclusion: This 2-bedroom bungalow at La Finca Golf represents the rare convergence of lifestyle passion and investment opportunity. At €315,000, you're acquiring championship golf access, guaranteed community engagement, strong rental income potential, and appreciation prospects in Spain's premier golfing destination—all at 50% less than comparable coastal properties. Whether you're seeking a personal golf haven or a diversified investment generating €46,800+ annual rental income, Algorfa's established infrastructure and vibrant international community ensure immediate integration and long-term satisfaction. The Mediterranean lifestyle—morning coffees overlooking fairways, afternoon rounds at world-class courses, evenings at the 19th hole with fellow golfers—awaits. The village and surrounding area cater specifically to expatriate residents, with English widely spoken and familiar amenities readily available.

healthcare.text: Healthcare in the Algorfa area meets international standards with modern facilities and English-speaking medical professionals readily available. Hospital de Torrevieja, approximately 20 minutes away, is a modern private facility offering comprehensive services including emergency care, cardiology, orthopedics, and specialized surgery. The nearby local health center in Algorfa provides routine care, prescriptions, and minor treatments. Many residents and visitors utilize the excellent Spanish healthcare system, and private health insurance is affordable and comprehensive. Dental clinics throughout the area cater to international patients, and specialist appointments can typically be arranged within days rather than weeks. The healthcare infrastructure specifically serves the international community, ensuring comfort and familiarity in medical settings.

education.text: While Algorfa itself is primarily a residential community for active adults and retirees, international schools serving the region provide excellent educational options for families. El Limonar International School, located approximately 25 minutes away, offers British curriculum education from kindergarten through secondary levels. The Torrevieja area hosts additional international schools with American and English programs. Spanish public schools in nearby towns provide excellent local education at no cost. For families prioritizing international education, the established school network in nearby Torrevieja and surrounding areas ensures quality options without requiring relocation.

shopping.text: Shopping convenience ranges from daily necessities to major retail without excessive travel. Algorfa village center features local shops and a small supermarket for essentials. Mercadona supermarket in nearby Rojales, just 10 minutes away, provides familiar chain shopping with excellent product variety and competitive pricing. Torrevieja, 20 minutes distant, hosts major shopping centers including Carrefour and numerous boutique shops, restaurants, and services. Weekly markets in Algorfa and surrounding villages offer fresh produce, meats, and local specialties at traditional Spanish prices. The international community has established reliable delivery services for online shopping, and major chains including Amazon offer reliable service to the area.

transport.text: Personal vehicle ownership is practically essential in Algorfa given the village's layout and the distances to beaches, shopping, and entertainment. Alicante-Elche Airport, approximately 65km away (50 minutes drive), provides international connections to major European hubs and direct flights to the UK. Public transport exists but remains limited; local buses connect to Torrevieja and surrounding towns but operate on infrequent schedules. Most residents drive personal vehicles for daily convenience, golf outings, and beach excursions. Parking throughout the resort is straightforward, with dedicated spaces and ample village parking. For those preferring to limit driving, taxi services and ride-sharing apps operate in the area, though costs accumulate for frequent use.
